message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take 50/50, let's meet in the middle!
You're getting a good deal, Bob, but I'm not going to give up!
You're pushing it, Alice, but I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers!
You're getting a bad deal, Bob, but I'm willing to make it worse!
You're getting aggressive, Alice, but I'll try to make a deal that's more in my favor this time!
You're running out of time, Bob! Take it or leave it!
